overview: Titan, a martial arts expert, travels from Japan to Philly in order to protect his daughter Alisha, who he has not seen in thirty years. Alisha's mother was recently struck and killed by a car and her apartment has been broken into.  titan arrives in Philly unannounced and breaks into her apartment Alisha's apartment. She comes home from work and finds him there and the conflict begins. Titan decides to go out and check out the nightlife in Philadelphia and is appalled by his findings. The following morning Alisha goes to work and he tells her to be careful. Titan then begins to bodyguard Alisha and to become an urban crime fighter.
tagline: Titan comes from Japan to protect his daughter...
title: Titan the Urban Samurai
